div1.p: Légation et Consulat de la République de Liberia en Belgique et près L'Etat Indépendant Du Congo

J'ai l'honneur de faire part á votre Excellence qu'en date du 3 janvier derrier l'honorable William David Coleman a étè manqueré Président de la Republique de Libéria et que le Ministére étè constitué suit.

Honorable GW Gibson Secretary of State Mr A Barclay Secretary of the Treasury Mr HRW Johnson Postmaster General Mr HJ Moore Secretary of Interior Mr JC Stevens Attorney General L'honorable A Barclay egalement les fonctions de Secretaire de la guerre a étè la defence agreer et ( le Baron les a de un haute considèration
Son Excellence le Baron van Etvelde Secretaire de State de l'Etat Indépendant de Congo Bruxelles
The Legation Consulate General of the Republic of Liberia in Belgium and near the Congo Free State
Inscribed March 3, 1898 Number of order 10/98 Card

I have the honor of sharing to your Excellency dated from last January 3rd, the Honorable William David Coleman qui was missed President of the Republic of Liberia and the following constituted Ministry
Honorable GW Gibson Secretary of State Mr A Barclay Secretary of the Treasury Mr HRW Johnson Postmaster General Mr HJ Moore Secretary of Interior Mr JC Stevens Attorney General
The Honorable A Barclay equally the functions of Secretary of War and of Defense
Agreed Mr. Baron the of utmost considereations
The Baron van Eetvelde Secretary of State of the Congo Free State Brussels
